translations: v．削弱，使虚弱：使某人或某物变得虚弱或无力。
· The illness debilitates the immune system.
这种疾病削弱了免疫系统。

sentences.sentence: At this point, choice no longer liberates, but debilitates. It might even be said to tyrannize.
sentences.translation: 在这一点上，选择不再成为一种自由，反倒是束缚，甚至可以说成一种虐待。

sentences.sentence: It is an important step in combating a disease that still kills more than 700, 000 people a year and debilitates millions more.
sentences.translation: 每年因疟疾致死的人有700000人，致残的有数百万人，这个试验结果是战胜这一疾病的重大进步。
